com.ephesoft.dcma.util

Class FileStreamResult

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.xml.transform.stream.StreamResult
      • com.ephesoft.dcma.util.FileStreamResult
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javax.xml.transform.Result

    public class FileStreamResult
extends javax.xml.transform.stream.StreamResult
    Creates the stream with the file and stores the reference to the File with which the stream is created. Java doesnot support extracting the name of the file from the Stream. Its a wrapper to the StreamResult which stores the reference to the file with which the stream is created.
    Version:
    1.0.
    Author:
    Ephesoft.

    • Constructor Detail

      • FileStreamResult

        public FileStreamResult(java.io.File streamedFile,
                java.io.OutputStream outputStream)
                 throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
        Creates a FileStreamResult with the streamedFile. Also stores the reference to the file with which the reference was created.
        Parameters:
        streamedFile - File which which the stream was created.
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - When the file which the stream needs to be created doesnot exist.

    • Method Detail

        public java.io.File getStreamedFile()
